task.title: Orchestrate : .Creating a Master Page Layout vOctober-23
task.shortdesc: Created by William Abernathy on Sep 20, 2023

taskbody.context: Create a master page layout (template) with the Contact, Account, Due Date, and Subject fields and any other fields you desire. After creating a master page layout, you can copy (save it as, or clone it) every time you need to create a new page layout without having to start from scratch.

step.cmd: In Setup, go to the custom object for which the master page layout is needed.
Select the Page Layouts link or scroll down to that frame.
Leave the Existing Page Layout as None.

Enter *Master Page Layout in the Page Layout Name field and click the Save button.
Note The asterisk (*) makes this page layout name always appear at the top of the list.
Drag and drop the fields, buttons, and related lists where you want them:

substep.cmd: Add Contact, Account, Due Date, Subject and any other fields you want future page layouts to have as defaults.
Add the Open Activities, Activity History, and Notes & Attachments related lists.
Add the Process Visual and Process Details buttons.
